name: botbuilder
author: Microsoft Corp.
description: Bot Builder core library. Bot Builder is a toolkit for building rich bots on virtually any platform.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\botbuilder .\lib\botbuilder.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK - Core" --readme none
